name: MS Teams
description: Plugin to sync Mattermost channels with Microsoft Teams channels

settings.help_text: Microsoft Teams Tenant ID
Microsoft Teams Client ID
Microsoft Teams Client Secret
The AES encryption key used to encrypt stored access tokens
Microsoft Teams will use this secret to send messages to Mattermost
Certificate public part
Certificate private key

settings.display_name: Use the evaluation API pay model
settings.help_text: The evaluation API pay model only allows you to get a limited number of change notifications. Be sure your system keeps them low if you enable this setting
Set the number of minutes between users sync (Leave it empty to disable users sync)
Set the value to 'true' to sync MS Teams guest users
Sync notifications for any connected user. Enabling this setting disables syncing of direct messages and group messages.
Sync direct messages where any of the user in the conversation is a real Mattermost user connected to MS Teams account
Sync group messages where any of the user in the conversation is a real Mattermost user connected to MS Teams account
Only sync chats and group chats to remote users. This avoids dual notifications when two connected Mattermost users are part of a conversation.
Sync messages from channels linked between Mattermost and MS Teams
Mattermost teams where sync is enabled (comma separated Mattermost team names, empty means all enabled)

settings.display_name: Maximum size of attachments to support complete one time download (in MB)
settings.help_text: Set the maximum size for attachments that can be loaded into the memory. Attachments bigger than this size will be streamed from MS Teams to Mattermost

settings.display_name: Buffer size for streaming files (in MB)
settings.help_text: Set the buffer size for streaming files from MS Teams to Mattermost
The maximum number of users that may connect their MS Teams account. Once connected, users may reconnect at any time. (Set to 0 to disable new connections.)

Invite pool size: the maximum number of connection invites that may be pending at a given time. When specified, connection invite direct messages will be sent to users as they become active, up to the maximum specified here. As invited users connect, spaces in the invite pool will open up and more invites will be sent out. Once invited, users may connect at any time. (Set to 0 or leave empty to disable connection invites.)
When true, only whitelisted users may connect their account.
When true, synthetic users will be converted to members when they login for the first time.

settings.display_name: Disable using the sync msg infrastructure for tracking message changes
settings.help_text: When true, the plugin will not enable any sync msg infrastructure.

settings.display_name: Disable periodically checking the validity of the application credentials
settings.help_text: When true, the plugin will not periodically check the validity of the application credentials.
Select the authentication service to use when creating synthetic users. This should match the service used for member user access to Mattermost. Default is 'SAML'.
Select the MS Teams user property to use as the authentication identifier. For AD/LDAP and SAML, the identifier's value should match the value provided by the ID Attribute.
